title: 哦，勋章页面变的好鬼畜
author: nixgnot
txt_content:
大概吧
和以前不一样了

replies.author: mine米
replies.txt_content: 我也注意到了……大概没事吧

replies.author: minehenry
replies.txt_content: 管他呢 反正我的勋章依旧能刷屏233

replies.author: 武王撞钟
replies.txt_content: 勋章还是不能隐藏展示

replies.author: rainsojey
replies.txt_content: 这样改显得更明显了
不鬼畜啊，好像好看了不少

replies.author: G王者Z巨蟹Y
replies.txt_content: 感觉比以前整洁多了

replies.author: 爱心魔王FHC
replies.txt_content: 比以前好多了啊，反正不影响我拿勋章

replies.author: JIE__
replies.txt_content: 我感觉更明了,不要一直往下拉

replies.author: RaiRinDown
replies.txt_content: 不但鬼畜,而且长的要死要活的

replies.author: jiand_jun~~~
replies.txt_content: 还可以吧 不过领取的时候 会出现那个错误

replies.author: Anicca
replies.txt_content: 这个比以前的好

replies.author: HuaiYang
凯文丶
replies.txt_content: 真的变了。。。。之前是一排下来的，现在都已经两排了

replies.author: 侑阳
replies.txt_content: 不说我都没发现

replies.author: 一起走
replies.txt_content: 是变了不少

replies.author: Boys_Craft
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: One_Time
replies.txt_content: 鬼畜

replies.author: One_Time
replies.txt_content: 鬼畜

replies.author: One_Time
replies.txt_content: 鬼畜
嗯，有这样的感觉

replies.author: Heer_Kaisair
replies.txt_content:
Discuz！的问题还是蛮多的。
勋章什么的我要哭了。
